title: More information and Link to SimpleType image
content:
Here’s an image that shows what the SimpleType typeface looks like.

[http://typophile.com/files/Picture](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202200540/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture "http://typophile.com/files/Picture") 2\_5.jpg

The company who sold the freeware was called Swfte International.

Thanks!

diane t.

Moderator Note: [http://typophile.com/node/36380](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202200540/http:/typophile.com/node/36380 "http://typophile.com/node/36380")

author: dianetch

comments.content: This is in the TYPE ID area already.
